get.description: Fetches a list of all users registered in the system. No parameters are required for this call

post.description: Deletes a user from the database along with their associated data, provided there are no active or future rentals or bookings.
Creates a new user profile in the database after successful Firebase authentication. Includes user details like email, name, and role.
Updates the role of an existing user (e.g., from user to admin).
Updates the details of an existing user, including their name, address, and other profile information.

get.description: Fetches details of a specific user based on the user_id parameter. An action parameter is also required to specify the operation.

post.description: Creates a new rental record for a storage space. Checks for date conflicts before proceeding.
Deletes a rental record from the database. Ensures no active or future rentals are associated.

get.description: Retrieves all rental records from the database. Useful for administrative or reporting purposes.
Fetches all rentals for storage spaces owned by a specific user (owner_id).
Retrieves details of a specific rental based on the rental_id parameter.
Fetches all rentals made by a specific user (renter_id).
Retrieves all rentals associated with a specific storage space (storage_id).

post.description: Creates or updates a review for a storage space by a user. Ensures only one review per user per storage space.
Deletes a specific review based on its review_id.

get.description: Lists all reviews across the platform. Useful for general reporting or monitoring.
Retrieves reviews associated with storage spaces owned by a specific user (owner_id).
Fetches details of a specific review based on the review_id.
Retrieves all reviews for a specific storage space (storage_id).
Retrieves all reviews left by a specific user (user_id).

post.description: Updates a review by its review_id. Useful for editing review content or ratings.
Adds a new storage location. Requires details like title, description, storage type, and price.
Deletes a storage location if no active or future rentals exist for it.

get.description: Retrieves all available storage locations across the platform.
Fetches details of a specific storage location (storage_id).
Lists all storage locations owned by a specific user (user_id).

post.description: Updates the details of an existing storage location. Useful for modifying price, description, or availability.

message.description: General message indicating the result of the operation (e.g., 'Storage location fetched successfully').

data.description: An array containing information about the requested storage location. This array will contain exactly one item.

storage_id.description: The unique ID of the storage location.

owner_id.description: The ID of the user who owns the storage location.

title.description: The title or name of the storage location.

description.description: A description of the storage location.

size.description: The size of the storage location (consider using a unit).

location.description: The general location of the storage location (e.g., '123 Main St, Dublin').

price_per_month.description: The monthly price for renting the storage location.

availability.description: The current availability status of the storage location (e.g., 'available').

images_url.description: The URL of an image representing the storage location (optional).

insurance_option.description: Whether insurance is included (e.g., true for yes, false for no).

created_at.description: The date and time the storage location was created (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ).

updated_at.description: The date and time the storage location was last updated (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ).

eircode.description: The Eircode (Irish postcode) for the storage location.

ListStorageLocationByIdResponse.title: ListStorageLocationByIdResponse
ListStorageLocationByIdResponse.description: Response containing details about a storage location identified by its ID.

rental_id.description: The ID of the rental to be deleted

data.description: Data containing user information

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user to remove

payment_status.description: The payment status of the rental (e.g., 'paid', 'pending', 'failed')

owner_id.description: The ID of the storage unit owner

storage_id.description: The ID of the storage unit being rented

storage_title.description: The title or name of the storage unit

storage_description.description: A description of the storage unit

storage_size.description: The size of the storage unit

storage_location.description: The address of the storage unit

price_per_month.description: The monthly price of the storage unit

insurance_option.description: Whether the rental includes optional insurance

eircode.description: The Irish Eircode (postal code) for the storage unit

review_id.description: The unique ID of the review.

rating.description: The rating given by the user (likely between 1 and 5).

owner_email.description: The email address of the owner of the storage location.
